text: John "Johnny" Borneman III (born June 30, 1977) is an American stock car racing driver. He currently races part-time in the ARCA Menards Series West, driving for his own team in the No. 8 Chevrolet. ==Racing career== ==Personal life== Borneman was born in Ramona, California. His father is John Borneman Jr., a Whelen All-American Series champion who also competed in the NASCAR Cup, Truck, and West Series like his son. He finances his racing career with the money he makes from his construction business. ==Motorsports career results== ===NASCAR=== (key) (Bold – Pole position awarded by qualifying time.
